column5: After Lews post of a portriat of Marvin done by Maureen,I knew what would be a nice thank you for the mrs,s ,after getting me my new camera.  A pm to Maureen and it was a done deal.  Today she was up here in Barrie and brought the finished gift.  I was in AWWWWWWWWWW.  You do very nice work and it brought a tear to the mrs,s.  Thanks again Maureen.  Cuddles  The start    The finish
Yeah not sure how much longer she will be around (cuddles),so figured I would get something sentimental instead of material.
Nice work!!, at first I thought it was a photo.
Thank You All, for your kind words about the portrait of Cuddles..I'll have to give all these pups a cameo appearance in an Off The Dock Toon some day!
we could use the small dogs as muskie bait and it really would be off the dock......LOL  great paintings for sure
nice piece of artwork looks awesome
